div.p: {{tp|Your task is to put the sentences into correct order. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli|Click on the sentence you wish to move. The sentence will be highlighted.}}
{{tli1|Hold the left mouse button down and drag the sentence to the right place.}}
{{tli2|When the mouse arrow points to the right place, release the left mouse button.}}
{{tli3|The sentence will be moved.}}

div.p: {{tp1|Your task is to put the pictures into correct order. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli4|Click on the picture you wish to move. The picture will be highlighted.}}
{{tli5|Hold the left mouse button down and drag the picture to the right place.}}
{{tli6|When the mouse arrow points to the right place, release the left mouse button.}}
{{tli7|The picture will be moved.}}

div.p: {{tp2|Your task is to put the words into correct order. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli8|Click on the word you wish to move. The word will be highlighted.}}
{{tli9|Hold the left mouse button down and drag the word to the right place.}}
{{tli10|When the mouse arrow points to the right place, release the left mouse button.}}
{{tli11|The word will be moved.}}

div.p: {{tp3|Your task is to put the characters into correct order. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli12|Click on the character you wish to move. The character will be highlighted.}}
{{tli13|Hold the left mouse button down and drag the character to the right place.}}
{{tli14|When the mouse arrow points to the right place, release the left mouse button.}}
{{tli15|The character will be moved.}}

div.p: {{tp4|It is your task to connect (pair) left column items with items of the right column. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli16|Click on the item in the right column that you wish to move. The item will be highlighted.}}
{{tli17|Hold the left mouse button down and drag the right column item next to the corresponding left column item.}}
{{tli18|Release the left mouse button.}}
{{tli19|The items will be linked.}}

div.p: {{tp5|Your task is to pair the left column items with the items of the right column, so that the created pairs make sense. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli20|Left click an icon to select a left column item. The item will be highlighted.}}
{{tli21|Click on the corresponding item in the right column.}}
{{tli22|The item from the right column will be moved next to the correspoding item from the left column.}}
{{tli23|The items will be linked.}}

div.p: {{tp6|Your task is to select the correct one out of several offered options. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli24|Left click the chosen item.}}
{{tli25|If you wish to change your selection, click another option.}}

div.p: {{tp7|Your task is to mark sentence parts, words, word parts or syllables while you may choose from several items but only one choice is correct. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli26|Place the mouse cursor over the item (sentence part, word, word part or syllable) you wish to select.}}
{{tli27|Left click the item, it will be marked (selected).}}

div.p: {{tp8|To change your selection select a different item.}}
{{tp9|Your task is to select sentence parts, words, word parts, syllables or characters. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli28|Place the mouse cursor over the item (sentence part, word, word part, syllable or character) you wish to select.}}
{{tli29|Left click the item, it will be marked (selected).}}

div.p: {{tp10|To cancel your selection click on selected item again.}}
{{tp11|Your task is to select (mark) correct options. None of the options are selected by default. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli30|Left click the chosen item.}}
{{tli31|The option will be selected (marked).}}

div.p: {{tp12|To cancel your selection click on selected item again.}}
{{tp13|Your task is to write down the items into several groups. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli32|Click on the empty space in the group - a blinking cursor appears.}}
{{tli33|Type in the item using your keyboard.}}

div.p: {{tp14|To edit the item, select it and make correction.}}
{{tp15|Your task is to sort the items from the list into several groups. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli34|Click an item in the list. It will be highlighted.}}
{{tli35|Hold your left mouse button down and drag the item to an empty space in the correct group.}}
{{tli36|Release the left mouse button.}}
{{tli37|The item will be moved into the chosen group and will be deactivated in the list.}}

div.p: {{tp16|To recall the item from the group back to list, click on it.}}
{{tp17|Your task is to fill in the empty boxes within the text. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli38|Click on the empty space - a blinking cursor appears.}}
{{tli39|Type in the text using your keyboard.}}

div.p: {{tp18|Your task is to fill in the empty boxes within the text. You are given a list of items with different properties as described below:}}

ol.li: {{tli40|after dragging, the item in the list will be deactivated}}
{{tli41|after dragging, the item in the list is not deactivated and can be used again}}

div.p: {{tp19|Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli42|Click an item in the list. It will be highlighted.}}
{{tli43|Hold the left mouse button down and drag the item to the empty gap.}}
{{tli44|Release the left mouse button. The item will be moved.}}

div.p: {{tp20|To recall your selection, select and drag a different item from the list into its place.}}
{{tp21|Your task is to fill in the empty boxes within the text. You are given a list of items with different properties as described below:}}

ol.li: {{tli45|after filling in to the text, the item in the menu is deactivated}}
{{tli46|after filling in, the item in the list is not deactivated and can be used again}}

div.p: {{tp22|Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli47|Click on the empty gap - a menu with items appears}}
{{tli48|Click a selected item. It will be filled in to the gap.}}

div.p: {{tp23|To change the filled in item, fill in another one into its place.}}
{{tp24|Your task is to decide whether the sentences are true or false. Every sentence is marked with an icon. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli49|If the sentence is false, skip it.}}
{{tli50|If the sentence is true, click on it. It will be selected (marked).}}
{{tli51|To cancel your selection click on selected item again.}}

div.p: {{tp25|Your task is to decide whether the sentences are true or false. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli52|If the sentence is true, click on True.}}
{{tli53|If the sentence is false, click on False.}}

div.p: {{tp26|Your task is to decide whether the answers to the questions are Yes or No.}}

ol.li: {{tli54|If the correct answer is Yes, click on YES.}}
{{tli55|If the correct answer is No, click on NO.}}

div.p: {{tp27|Your task is to fill in the empty boxes with the words or sentences you hear. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli56|Listen to the word or the sentence.}}
{{tli57|Click on the empty space - a blinking cursor appears.}}
{{tli58|Type in the text that you hear using your keyboard.}}

div.p: {{tp28|To edit the item, select it and make correction.}}
{{tp29|Your task is to rewrite the words in the gap into the correct form. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli59|Click on the text you wish to change - a blinking cursor appears.}}
{{tli60|Rewrite the text into the correct form. It is possible, that no changes will be needed.}}

body.div: {{th120|INFORMATION}}{{tpage_instruction|Your task is to carefully read the information on this page.}}

div.p: {{tp30|Exercise with hidden text. To unhide it, click on the "eye" icon.}}
{{tp31|Exercises with a sound-track can be recognized by their “sound mark”. There are two types of sound mark:}}

ol.li: {{tli61|A big sound mark is used to replay longer recordings (articles, dialogues). In this case you cannot see the text, you can only hear it.}}
{{tli62|A small sound mark is used to replay words or sentences. You can see the text and listen to it at the same time.}}
{{tli63|To play the sound, click the sound mark. To stop replaying, click elsewhere on the screen.}}

div.p: {{tp32|To play the video you can use the following controls from the bottom control bar.}}

ol.li: {{tli64|To start playing the video, click Play (>).}}
{{tli65|To stop playing, click Pause (||).}}
{{tli66|Use the arrows: |<<, >>|, to move one replica back or forward.}}
{{tli67|Use the arrows: <<, >>, to move one sentence (part of the replica) back or forward.}}
{{tli68|Use T (icon) to display or hide the subtitles.}}
{{tli69|Use the microphone icon, to run the Listen&Talk application for the current sentence.}}
{{tli70|Use the speaker icon to turn the sound on/off.}}

div.p: {{tp33|When learning new vocabulary, proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli71|Read the new word (phrase) and the corresponding translation.}}
{{tli72|Click the speaker icon and listen to the correct pronunciation.}}
{{tli73|Click the microphone icon and practice correct pronunciation using Listen&Talk application.}}

div.p: {{tp34|When practicing your pronunciation, proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli74|Click the Play icon and listen to the original recording.}}
{{tli75|Click the Record icon and record your own pronunciation. To stop recording, click the icon again.}}
{{tli76|Click the next Play icon, replay your recording and compare it with the original one.}}
{{tli77|Repeat the whole process until you are satisfied with the result.}}
